p: Of the 180 studied cases, 153 (85 %) were fatal. The case fatality rate increased from 73% in 2005 to 100% in 2012 and subsequent years ( Figure 1A). There were no significant differences in age, gender, or days since illness onset before presentation between surviving and fatal cases (data not shown). Over time, the days since illness onset were also similar each year until 2012 but appeared longer during the period 2013â€“2015, although numbers are very small ( Supplementary Figure 1).
